channel.title: Development, Eleventy, Micropost on Summitt Dweller's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Development, Eleventy, Micropost on Summitt Dweller's Blog

item.title: relearning-11ty.html
item.description: As I started to follow-up on Gating My Content & More - Parts 1 and 2 I quickly realized that I’ve already forgotten most of what I learned about eleventy back in December. So, since I already have years of Hugo experience, I elected to begin again with Migrating from Hugo to Eleventy and that article makes an early reference to A Deep Dive Into Eleventy Static Site Generator. If those fail there’s Let’s Learn Eleventy.
